generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings and vehicles driving on it.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial and residential structures.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street, particularly on the left side.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing bright and clear.
- car: Several cars are parked along the sides of the road and one is visible in the foreground.
- bus: A white bus is parked on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible on poles along the road, including a parking sign and a directional sign.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those holding traffic signs and streetlights.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
